statements: DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND activity_description LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 'abc-123' AND activity_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_profile WHERE last_login < '2022-03-15 12:00:00' AND username = 'johndoe';

DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND activity_id = 3;
DELETE FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 101 AND activity_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM user_sessions WHERE session_id = 500 OR user_id = 101;
DELETE FROM UserActivities WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND activity_time < '2022-01-01';
